attributes.action: Write off all tutor fees for third year nursing students.
attributes.additional_details: All tuition fees for third year students should be revoked.
attributes.background: Third year nursing students have bravely answered the call of the Health Secretary’s request to join essential frontline workers. Their dedication should be rewarded by The Government writing off all of their tuition fees that they have incurred.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302844

You may also wish to sign these similar petitions:

Reimburse nurses for student loans and fund all fees for future student nurses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302732 

Reduce student debt for student nurses and midwives: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300079
